name: Observable
description: The observable object is a pivot element that contains related information found in many places in the event.

name.description: The name of the observable attribute. For example: `file`

type.description: The observable type not in the pre-defined type enums. For example: "Location"

data.description: The data associated with the observable. The meaning of this data depends on the observable type.

roles.description: The observable roles not in the pre-defined role enums. For example: "Bad Location"

value.description: The value of the attribute to which the enriched data pertains.
